body:
Features and Enhancements

Network Builder and Optimizer
  • Ability to bulk paste delimited list of TINs in the Find Providers form.
    • Delimited by comma, space, pipe, semicolon, new line
  • NPI appears after provider name in autocomplete.
  • Competitive Access in NBO: link from provider profile section to modeling results page.
    • Link to a provider then add or remove the provider from the Find Providers page.
Competitive Dashboard
  • When selected, exclude 10% market penetration impact Top Networks and Top Hospitals by Bed Count, in addition to Top Market Penetration.
Confirmed Practicing
  • Added Network Strength to Compare Network results when Confirmed Practicing is selected.

Issues Fixed

Create a List Comparison Networks
  • Fixed an issue where the Comparison Network did not produce expected results when network was or was not included in the network critieria.
Participation Codes in Detail Results Exports
  • Fixed an issue where Hospital Participation codes were misleading.
    • NOTE: The PLS and PS codes are only available in the Specialty Detail version of the network export.
